description: Touch events touchstart, touchmove, touchend, and touchcancel fire when users interact with a touch-sensitive surface, such as a screen or drawing tablet. These events are similar to mouse events.
description_html: Touch events touchstart, touchmove, touchend, and touchcancel fire when users interact with a touch-sensitive surface, such as a screen or drawing tablet. These events are similar to mouse events.
name: Touch events

firefox.notes: This interface is only exposed if a touch input device is detected.
Removed in bug 888304 due to web compatibility issues.

chrome.notes: Chrome only supports the following touchEventInit properties: touches, targetTouches, changedTouches.
